questions_and_answers.question: If you encounter a victim of electric shock, what is the first action you should take?
options: B. Touch the person to check their pulse
C. Switch off the power or remove the source of contact
D. Give them water to drink
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: C. Switch off the power or remove the source of contact

questions_and_answers.question: In the case of severe bleeding, what is the immediate action you should take?
options: A. Make the patient sit up
B. Apply ice to the wound
C. Make the patient lie down and rest
D. Leave the patient alone until help arrives
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: C. Make the patient lie down and rest

questions_and_answers.question: What is the first step you should take when providing first aid to a person who has suffered an electric shock?
options: C. Disconnect the power source or remove the victim from contact with the live conductor
D. Apply ice to any burns
questions_and_answers.correct_answer: C. Disconnect the power source or remove the victim from contact with the live conductor
